name: Sushi
description: Sushi is an automated market making protocol designed for token swaps. It is a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users add their assets to different liquidity pools and earn fees.

en.name: Sushi
en.description: Sushi is an automated market making protocol designed for token swaps. It is a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users add their assets to different liquidity pools and earn fees.

fr.name: Sushi
fr.description: Sushi est un protocole de création de marché automatisé (market making) conçu pour les échanges de jetons. Il s'agit d'un agrégateur de liquidités décentralisé dans lequel les utilisateurs déposent leurs actifs dans différentse pools de liquidités et reçoivent les frais générés.

es.name: Sushi
es.description: Sushi es un protocolo de creación de mercado automatizado diseñado para intercambios de tokens. Es un agregador de liquidez descentralizado donde los usuarios agregan sus activos a diferentes fondos de liquidez y ganan parte de las tarifas.

de.name: Sushi
de.description: Sushi ist ein automatisches Market-Making-Protokoll, das für Token-Swaps entwickelt wurde. Es ist ein dezentraler Liquiditätsaggregator, bei dem Benutzer ihre Vermögenswerte zu verschiedenen Liquiditätspools hinzufügen und Gebühren verdienen.

pt.name: Sushi
pt.description: Sushi é um protocolo automatizado de criação de mercado designado para trocas entre tokens. É um agregador de liquidez descentralizado onde os usuários adicionam seus ativos em diferentes pools e recebem taxas.

el.name: Sushi
el.description: Sushi is an automated market making protocol designed for token swaps. It is a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users add their assets to different liquidity pools and earn fees.

tr.name: Sushi
tr.description: Sushi, token takasları için tasarlanmış otomatik bir piyasa oluşturma protokolüdür. Kullanıcıların varlıklarını farklı likidite havuzlarına eklediği ve ücret kazandığı merkezi olmayan bir likidite toplayıcıdır.

vi.name: Sushi
vi.description: Sushi is an automated market making protocol designed for token swaps. It is a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users add their assets to different liquidity pools and earn fees.

zh.name: Sushi
zh.description: Sushi 是一个自动化做市商协议，用于交换代币。Sushi 是一个去中心化流动性聚合器，用户可以存入资产到不同的流动性池赚取收益。

hi.name: Sushi
hi.description: Sushi एक स्वचालित बाजार बनाने वाला प्रोटोकॉल है जिसे टोकन स्वैप के लिए डिज़ाइन किया गया है। यह एक विकेन्द्रीकृत तरलता एग्रीगेटर है जहां उपयोगकर्ता अपनी संपत्ति को विभिन्न तरलता पूल में जोड़ते हैं और शुल्क कमाते हैं।

ja.name: Sushi
ja.description: Sushi is an automated market making protocol designed for token swaps. It is a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users add their assets to different liquidity pools and earn fees.

id.description: Sushi is an automated market making protocol designed for token swaps. It is a decentralized liquidity aggregator where users add their assets to different liquidity pools and earn fees.
